anchoring.content:
You are a cognitive scientist, to answer the following question:
when does the little couples new season start
I will provide you with several retrieved passages:
Passages:
['The new season of The Little Couple premiered on September 19, 2017.\n', 'They were originally introduced in a one-hour TLC special, "Little People: Just Married". Season 1 of the show premiered on May 26, 2009. Season 2 premiered on October 27, 2009. On February 22, 2010, TLC renewed "The Little Couple" for a third season consisting of 20 episodes. The mid-season finale aired after 9 episodes on July 27, 2010, and season 3 returned on October 12, 2010. It was announced on Facebook that the show would be returning for its 4th season on May 31, 2011. Again, the season was split, with the second half of season 4 premiering on September 27, 2011.\n', 'Season 2 of the program, My Little Television V2, began airing on March 29, 2019.\n', 'The Kids season premiered on January 7, 2017. It replaced the time slot of "Kapamilya Weekend Specials" filler block, which temporary filled the vacated timeslot of "Pinoy Boyband Superstar".\n', 'On June 28, 2010, ABC Family ordered 12 more episodes of the show, bringing its total first-season order to 22. On January 10, 2011, ABC Family picked the show up for a second season that premiered on June 14, 2011. During the summer of 2011, "Pretty Little Liars" was basic cable\'s top scripted series in women aged 18–34 and viewers 12–34. The second half of season 2 aired on Mondays at 8/7c, beginning on January 2, 2012.\n', "The show was placed into pre-production in June 2014 for a potential 2015 season premiere. The show was introduced at a Licensing Expo on June 17, 2014. The show is the first Fisher Price brand done by newly acquired (2012) Hit. The show debut on weekday schedule on Universal Kids on March 7, 2016 and March 1st in Canada on Family Jr. Cartoon Network UK's sister preschool channel Cartoonito premiered the Little People TV series on April 11, 2016.\n", 'The Little Couple\n', 'BULLET::::- March 25: "Pretty Little Liars" (season 5) on ETC\n', 'BULLET::::- March 26: "Pretty Little Liars" (season 4) on ETC\n', 'BULLET::::- "May 26" – The Little Couple\n']

This process aims to ensure that statements or claims are based on reliable and verifiable information while eliminating inaccurate or misleading content.

question_info.question: when does the little couples new season start
passages:
The new season of The Little Couple premiered on September 19, 2017.
They were originally introduced in a one-hour TLC special, "Little People: Just Married". Season 1 of the show premiered on May 26, 2009. Season 2 premiered on October 27, 2009. On February 22, 2010, TLC renewed "The Little Couple" for a third season consisting of 20 episodes. The mid-season finale aired after 9 episodes on July 27, 2010, and season 3 returned on October 12, 2010. It was announced on Facebook that the show would be returning for its 4th season on May 31, 2011. Again, the season was split, with the second half of season 4 premiering on September 27, 2011.
Season 2 of the program, My Little Television V2, began airing on March 29, 2019.
The Kids season premiered on January 7, 2017. It replaced the time slot of "Kapamilya Weekend Specials" filler block, which temporary filled the vacated timeslot of "Pinoy Boyband Superstar".
On June 28, 2010, ABC Family ordered 12 more episodes of the show, bringing its total first-season order to 22. On January 10, 2011, ABC Family picked the show up for a second season that premiered on June 14, 2011. During the summer of 2011, "Pretty Little Liars" was basic cable's top scripted series in women aged 18–34 and viewers 12–34. The second half of season 2 aired on Mondays at 8/7c, beginning on January 2, 2012.
The show was placed into pre-production in June 2014 for a potential 2015 season premiere. The show was introduced at a Licensing Expo on June 17, 2014. The show is the first Fisher Price brand done by newly acquired (2012) Hit. The show debut on weekday schedule on Universal Kids on March 7, 2016 and March 1st in Canada on Family Jr. Cartoon Network UK's sister preschool channel Cartoonito premiered the Little People TV series on April 11, 2016.
